name: Peer Support Program
description: A peer support program serving caregivers and parents of children and transitional-age youth involved in child-serving systems such as foster care, mental health, juvenile justice, and special education. Services include: - Case Management - Assistance with systems navigation (Special -Education, Behavioral Health, Child Welfare, Juvenile Justice) - Advocacy - Support groups and educational and life skills workshops - Parenting classes - Referrals to health and community resources"
